articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Wreath to Bier of Ri Tong Gyu
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Wreath to Bier of Ri Tong Gyu
Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un sent a wreath to the bier of Ri Tong Gyu, winner of Kim Il Sung Prize and Kim Jong Il Prize, labor hero, academician, prof. and dr. and honorary faculty dean of Kim Hyong Jik Military Medical University, on Sunday, expressing deep condolences over his death.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju Sends Message of Condolences to Singaporean PM
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju Sends Message of Condolences to Singaporean PM
Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju Monday sent a message of condolences to Singaporean Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong. 
					 The message expressed the deepest condolences to the prime minister and the bereaved families upon hearing the sad news that HE Lee Kuan Yew, founder of the Republic of Singapore and a close friend of the Korean people, passed away to their sorrow.

articles.title: Art Performance Given before Full House
articles.content:
Art Performance Given before Full House
Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- An art performance "Songs Full of Memories" was given at the People's Theater here before full house from Feb. 21 to Mar. 22.
					 Among the audience were leading officials of the party, state and army, officials of the party and armed forces organs, ministries and national institutions, persons of merits, officials, creators, artistes, teachers and students in the field of literature and art, people of various circles, service persons and their families, bereaved families of the revolutionary martyrs and Pyongyangites.
					
					 Put on the stage were prelude orchestral music and chorus "The General Will Live Forever as the Sun" as a prelude and such numbers as male solo and male chorus "The Path of a Soldier" and cello solo "Best Wishes."
					
					 The performance was given by former and incumbent famous actors and actresses of the Mansudae Art Troupe, the Pochonbo Electronic Ensemble and the Wangjaesan Art Troupe.
					
					 Among them were O Phil Bae, Choe Kum Hui, Kim Hak Sun, Kang Se Hyok, Ri Ja Yong and others who received the titles of People's Artiste and Merited Artiste, a merited instrumental ensemble group widely known as "snow princess" to Koreans and international musical circle, merited female chorus group which had the honor of performing before President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il more than 360 times, veteran singers of the male quartet group including People's Artiste Ju Chang Hyok, People's Artistes Kim Sung Yon and Choe Sam Suk, and Kim Kwang Suk, Jon Hye Yong, Ri Kyong Suk, Ri Pun Hui, Jo Kum Hwa and others loved much by the Korean people.
					
					 The stage was particularly decorated by songs presented by O Jong Yun and Hwang Suk Gyong and other singers of the Wangjaesan Art Troupe which gave at least 900 performances at home and abroad, solo by People's Artiste Ryom Chong widely known for her peculiar tone color and voice and trumpet solo "I Think, Looking at You" by Merited Artiste Pak Chol Jun which Kim Jong Il appreciated as a typical number of the Wangjaesan Art Troupe.

articles.title: Agro-forestry Management Encouraged in DPRK
articles.content:
Agro-forestry Management Encouraged in DPRK
Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- It has been pushed forward in the DPRK to develop and introduce technologies for agro-forestry management of sloping fields.
					 North Hwanghae Province has made many achievements in applying the agro-forestry management.
					
					 In this regard, Kim Kwang Phil, director of the Land and Environmental Conservation Exchange Company under the Ministry of Land and Environment Protection, told KCNA:
					
					 The agro-forestry management of sloping fields makes it possible to ensure sustained production of food and forestry products and protect biological diversity and ecosystem.
					
					 It also favors the implementation of the MDGs (millennium development goals), the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change, the Convention on Biological Diversity and the UN Convention to Combat Desertification.
					
					 The project for the agro-forestry management of sloping fields is being successfully carried out in cooperation with the Swiss Agency for Development and Cooperation, FAO and the World Agroforestry Center.

articles.title: Modernization of Railways Promoted in DPRK
articles.content:
Modernization of Railways Promoted in DPRK
Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- A project to modernize railways is under way in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 Jang Won Sam, an official of the Ministry of Railways, told KCNA that non-point of contact rails were laid between Yomju and Naejung stations for the first time in the country last year as part of the modernization.
					
					 Non-point of contact rails were also laid in the sections of Sinryonpho-Unsan, Ryokpho-Ryuso, Jongbang-Sariwon and Taegyo-Sinanju, covering tens of kilometers, he said.
					
					 It is scheduled to lay the rails in more than 70 kilometers of sections under the Pyongyang, Hamhung and Kaechon railway bureaus this year.

articles.title: Mushroom Cultivation Gains Momentum
articles.content:
Mushroom Cultivation Gains Momentum
Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- Mushroom cultivation is gaining momentum in the DPRK.
					 Modern mushroom farms like the Pyongyang City Mushroom Farm have put their production on a normal basis.
					
					 High-yield varieties of mushroom are cultivated at different institutions, enterprises and co-op farms, including the Wonsan Shoes Factory and the Chongsan Co-op Farm in Kangso District, Nampho City.
					
					 Big efforts have also been paid to modernizing the technical equipment of production processes and putting the mushroom cultivation on a more scientific basis.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Intensifying Education in Revolutionary Traditions
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Intensifying Education in Revolutionary Traditions
Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Monday dedicates an article to the 15th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's work "On Intensifying Education in Revolutionary Traditions through Revolutionary Battle Sites and Revolutionary Sites".
					 The work, published in March Juche 89 (2000), clarifies the issues arising in intensifying the education in the revolutionary traditions as required by the developing revolution and other principled issues to be held fast to as basic tasks for preserving revolutionary battle sites and managing and operating them.
					
					 His work serves as an immortal great programme which marks a historic milestone in developing in depth the education in the revolutionary traditions on a new higher stage, the article notes, adding:
					
					 He visited the revolutionary battle sites in the area of Mt. Paektu several times, indicating the orientation and ways for sprucing up them as great centers for the education in the revolutionary traditions in terms of scale, form and contents so that party members and other working people might know well about the historic roots of our party and revolution and the immortal revolutionary feats of President Kim Il Sung in order to firmly preserve and successfully carry forward them.
					
					 Under the energetic leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un, the education in the revolutionary traditions is being intensified across the country.
					
					 It is the steadfast faith of Kim Jong Un to carry forward to the end the revolutionary cause of Juche and Songun that started in Mt. Paektu, holding the revolutionary traditions of Mt. Paektu as the eternal treasure of our revolution.
					
					 To intensify the education in the revolutionary traditions is an essential requirement for glorifying the tradition of devotedly defending the leader generation after generation and a firm guarantee for achieving a decisive victory in the stand-off with the U.S.
					
					 The proud tradition of Songun Korea's sure victories is given steady continuity.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Condemns Obama for Insulting Humankind
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Condemns Obama for Insulting Humankind
Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- 45 years have passed since the Nuclear Nonproliferation Treaty (NPT) took effect.
					 Obama issued a statement in this regard. He talked such nonsense that all countries should turn out in strengthening the NPT with the common goal of building the world without nuclear weapons.
					
					 He takes no notice of the U.S. accelerating the up-gradation of nuclear weapons. Yet, he called on other countries to have common goal of building the world without nuclear weapons. Rodong Sinmun on Monday says this in a commentary.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 That the U.S. let loose a spate of sophism again such as "NPT should be strengthened" is to put the non-nuclear states under the yoke of the treaty and create the era of nuclear hegemony that serves its will.
					
					 The U.S. is a criminal state with the precedent of having used nuclear weapons in 1945.
					
					 The world people still shudder when they think of the crime the U.S. committed by dropping A-bombs and turning Hiroshima and Nagasaki into debris of dead bodies.
					
					 No one can vouch that the U.S. will not ignite a nuclear war to bring humankind a nuclear disaster.
					
					 Obama had better quit the "Nobel Peace Prize" which was awarded to him for his whopping lies, before talking about the construction of the "world without nuclear weapons".

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Authorities' Submission to U.S. Ridiculed
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Authorities' Submission to U.S. Ridiculed
Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- High-ranking officials of south Korea including its chief executive vied with each other to visit U.S. ambassador Lippert, gesture of flattery, and they made much fuss over the knife attack on him, terming it "attack" on the south Korea-U.S. "alliance". These disgusting behaviors caused derision and criticism among people. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday observes in a commentary in this regard:  The puppet conservative forces' servile acts greatly hurt the national dignity of the south Koreans. They aroused skepticism, discontent and strong rebuff to the "alliance."
					
					 It is sheer sophism for the south Korean regime to talk about "alliance" as it has its sovereignty completely usurped by the U.S. 
					
					 The above-said "alliance" originated from the U.S. forces' presence in south Korea.
					
					 Keeping south Korea tightly bound to the "alliance," the U.S. has lorded it over for decades, perpetrating all sorts of arbitrary acts and forcing its people to undergo untold humiliation, misfortune, pain and disaster under the jackboots of GIs.
					
					 Equal status and rights between south Korea and the U.S. are unimaginable under such situation.
					
					 After the emergence of the present puppet conservative regime in south Korea, the shameful nature of south Korea-U.S. "alliance" has been brought into bolder relief.
					
					 The puppet forces offered their all for the tightened "alliance", kowtowing to the U.S., which only brought them shame, humiliation and cold shoulder.
					
					 They should lend ear to the angry shout of people that "alliance with the U.S. which puts its interests above those of the popular masses is intolerable".
					
					 However zealous the puppet conservative regime may get in its sycophancy toward the U.S., it will only spark off stronger anti-American sentiment among the south Koreans, concludes the commentary.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Accused of Disturbing Probe into Truth about Ferry Sewol Disaster
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Accused of Disturbing Probe into Truth about Ferry Sewol Disaster
Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- The Citizen Solidarity for Democratic Society in south Korea made public a commentary on Mar. 18 denouncing the authorities for disturbing the probe into the truth about ferry Sewol sinking incident.
					 The committee for probing the truth about ferry Sewol disaster has failed to start its activities because the "government" has neither cleared the proposals regarding the working regulations and budget and for the enforcement of special law nor advanced any plan, postponing the decision on salva ging the sunken ferry, the commentary said, adding:
					
					 Such disturbance is one more criminal act to destroy the evidence for probing the truth.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Sycophancy toward U.S. Protested
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Sycophancy toward U.S. Protested
Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- Organizations grouping people of various social standings in south Korea staged actions in various areas on Mar. 18 in protest against the puppet authorities' moves to accede to the U.S.-led Trans-Pacific Partnership (TPP).
					 Speakers said at a press conference held in Seoul that if south Korea is to accede to the TPP, it should comply with the demands of those countries which became its members earlier and would be obliged after its accession to import American beef infected with mad cow disease as well as Japan's fish contaminated by radioactivity to seriously harm the people's health.
					
					 Peasants and other organizations in Jeju Province held a press conference before the provincial "assembly" building, expressing concern over the south Korean agriculture to be ruined by the accession to the TPP.
					
					 Similar protest actions took place in 10 areas including Kwangju.

articles.title: End to S. Korean Authorities' Sycophancy towards U.S. Demanded
articles.content:
End to S. Korean Authorities' Sycophancy towards U.S. Demanded
Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- Ro Kil Nam, representative of Minjok Thongsin, an internet newspaper of Koreans in the U.S., posted an article on a website calling for putting an end to the history of sycophancy and treachery by the concerted efforts of the nation in the run-up to the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 The article accused the U.S. of mulling deploying THAAD in south Korea, blustering that it is obliged to protect the south Korean people from the "north's missile threat".
					
					 The world public is claiming that the deployment of THAAD in south Korea will bring a war disaster to the Korean peninsula but the south Korean authorities blindly okays it as they have no right to option and regard everything made in the U.S. as good.
					
					 The knife attack on the U.S. ambassador on March 5 that stunned the world was a stern punishment and warning to the U.S. which inflicted political, economic and cultural wound on south Korea.
					
					 He called all Koreans to put an end to the history of sycophancy and treachery through a just struggle, recalling that a dynamic struggle against the "government" is mounting in south Korea.

articles.title: U.S. Instigating Scattering of Leaflets against DPRK Denounced by S. Korean Youth
articles.content:
U.S. Instigating Scattering of Leaflets against DPRK Denounced by S. Korean Youth
Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- The south Korean youth held a press conference in Jongro District, Seoul on March 18 in protest against the U.S. instigating the scattering of leaflets against the DPRK, according to the south Korean website News 1.
					 Speakers at the press conference condemned the coteries of the "Alliance for the Movement of Free North" for announcing that they would scatter leaflets, DVDs and USBs against the north by using a drone five years since the Cheonan warship incident.
					
					 They recalled that the U.S. "Human Rights Foundation" promised funds necessary for scattering leaflets.
					
					 They went on:
					
					 The scattering of leaflets targeting the north will bring about the danger of war when the dangerous war exercises are being staged in south Korea.
					
					 It is under way with active support of the U.S.
					
					 They urged the U.S. to immediately stop encouraging the scattering of leaflets threatening peace on the Korean peninsula and lives of the people.

articles.title: Deployment of THAAD Opposed in S. Korea
articles.content:
Deployment of THAAD Opposed in S. Korea
Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- The South Kyongsang Provincial Headquarters of the South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration, the Joint Council of Civic and Public Organizations and the Progressive Federation of South Kyongsang Province held a press conference outside the building of the provincial office on Mar. 17 in protest against the planned U.S. deployment of THAAD in south Korea.
					 The organizations in a press release censured the regime and the "Saenuri Party" for zealously moving for THAAD deployment in south Korea and that the U.S. forces command in south Korea for going the lengths of officially confirming it had already surveyed the site for the THAAD deployment on Mar. 12.
					
					 The regime and the "Saenuri Party" bluster that the deployment is to cope with the "missile threat from the north" but it is, in actuality, pursuant to the U.S. Asia policy, the press release held, adding:
					
					 Once THAAD is deployed in south Korea, the Korean peninsula will not be free from constant nuclear confrontation.
					
					 The regime and the "Saenuri Party" should refrain from gambling over the destiny of the nation.

articles.title: 19th Seminar of World Political Parties on Building New Society Held
articles.content:
19th Seminar of World Political Parties on Building New Society Held
Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- The 19th seminar of political parties of the world on building a new society was held in Mexico from Mar. 12 to 14.
					 Present there were delegations and representatives of more than 100 political parties and organizations from over 40 countries including the DPRK, members of the leadership of the Workers' Party of Mexico and representatives of its affiliated organizations.
					
					 Leaders of various political parties and lawmakers of Mexico and diplomatic envoys were also present there on invitation.
					
					 Introduced there were messages of greetings from the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and political parties of different countries.
					
					 Alberto Anaya Gutierrez, national leader of the Workers' Party of Mexico, in his opening speech said that the seminar has been an annual event from 1997 under the co-sponsorship of the Worker's Party of Mexico and the WPK and it is developing into a great gathering of the world progressive political parties.
					
					 Representative of various political parties took the floor.
					
					 They denounced the imperialists' political, economic and military offensive and attempt of subversion against those countries aspiring after independence, estimated the activities of progressive political parties and organizations for building state and people's government and referred to the tasks and ways to do so.
					
					 They expressed solidarity with the struggle of the ruling parties and peoples including Cuba and Venezuela and adopted resolutions calling for checking outside forces' interference in the internal affairs of some countries.
					
					 An appeal was adopted calling upon the communist parties, workers' parties and progressive political parties and people of the world to celebrate with splendor the 70th anniversaries of Korea's liberation and the Workers' Party of Korea as the grand political festivals of an international scale.

articles.title: Belarusian Party Denounces U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Drills
articles.content:
Belarusian Party Denounces U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Drills
Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- The Communist Party of Belarus issued a statement on March 19 in denunciation of the U.S.-south Korea Key Resolve and Foal Eagle war drills for aggression.
					 The statement said:
					
					 We resolutely denounce the aggressive war exercises being staged by the U.S. imperialists and south Korean authorities, contrary to the Korean nation's desire for peaceful reunification.
					
					 The adventurous U.S.-south Korea joint military exercises are being described as "defensive" and "annual" but they are aggressive.
					
					 It is well-known that the recent exercises are aimed at bringing down the headquarters of the DPRK and occupying Pyongyang with the rapid deployment of the U.S. troops and through surprise preemptive strikes in case of contingency on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 The U.S.-south Korea joint military exercises are seriously threatening peace and security on the Korean peninsula and in the world.
					
					 We appeal the world community to blame the U.S.-south Korea joint military exercises that seriously infringe on the sovereignty of the DPRK.
					
					 We urge the U.S. and south Korea to immediately halt the aggressive moves against the DPRK which is pushing forward the building of a thriving socialist nation under the banner of the Juche idea.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Birth Anniversary to Be Celebrated in Ethiopia
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Birth Anniversary to Be Celebrated in Ethiopia
Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung was inaugurated in Addis Ababa on March 13.
					Nigatu Dagnachew, chairman of the National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism of Ethiopia, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					The preparatory committee decided to hold colorful political and cultural events in praise of the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Il Sung on the occasion.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Marked in Czech Republic
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Marked in Czech Republic
Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun) was formed in Prague on March 17. 
					 The general secretary of the Central Committee of the Czechoslovak Communist Party was elected chairman of the preparatory committee. 
					
					 The preparatory committee decided to hold multifarious political and cultural events including a seminar, roundtable talks and film show on the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Il Sung on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.

articles.title: Birth Anniversary of Kim Il Sung to Be Honored in Syria
articles.content:
Birth Anniversary of Kim Il Sung to Be Honored in Syria
Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee of the Socialist Unionist Party of Syria for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung was formed on March 12. 
					 Adnan Ismail, general secretary of the party, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee. 
					
					 He said that HE Kim Il Sung is the most prominent great man in the 20th century, revered by the world. Noting that it is the duty to celebrate his birth anniversary together with the Korean people, he expressed the will to hold diverse events on the occasion of the birth anniversary.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Praised by Nigerian Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Praised by Nigerian Organization
Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism posted on its internet homepage an article "Traits of Popular Leader" on March 16 on the occasion of the third anniversary of the election of supreme leader Kim Jong Un as first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK. 
					 The article said:
					
					 Supreme leader of the DPRK Kim Jong Un is boundlessly revered by the people. The international community is greatly moved by this. 
					
					 Then how is it possible that Kim Jong Un has won warm reverence from the people though it is only a few years since he made his debut in the political arena? 
					
					 The answer is his loving care for the people. 
					
					 Referring to the fact that Kim Jong Un warmly loves the service personnel and people, the article went on:
					
					 The noble love for the people shown by the peerlessly great man is inseparable from his transparent view on the people. 
					
					 Kim Jong Un regards the people as the most precious one in the world. 
					
					 Officials and the leader serve the people. This is his motto. 
					
					 Love for the people is the starting point of his all thinking and activities and the supreme principle and goal of his politics. 
					
					 Great successes have been achieved in the drive for improving the people's living standard in the DPRK under the leadership of Kim Jong Un devoting his all to the work for the people. 
					
					 No wonder, the people ardently love and absolutely trust and follow him.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia ofrenda floral ante feretro de difunto Ri Tong Gyu
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia ofrenda floral ante feretro de difunto Ri Tong Gyu
Pyongyang, 23 de marzo (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un envio el dia 22 una ofrenda floral ante el feretro del difunto Ri Tong Gyu, laureado con el Premio Kim Il Sung y el Premio Kim Jong Il, heroe del Trabajo, academico, profesor titular, doctor y jefe honorario de la facultad de la Academia de Sanidad Militar Kim Hyong Jik en senal de profundas condolencias por su fallecimiento.

articles.title: Se preve la ampliacion de ferrocarriles sin junturas
articles.content:
Se preve la ampliacion de ferrocarriles sin junturas
Pyongyang, 23 de marzo (ACNC) -- Esta en marcha la modernizacion de ferrovias en el sector de transporte ferroviario de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					De acuerdo con el funcionario del Ministerio del Ferrocarril, Jang Won Sam, la primera ferrovia sin juntura fue construida en el tramo Yomju-Naejung con la ayuda de los cientificos.
					
					En el ano pasado, los ferrocarriles de ese tipo fueron construidos en decenas de kilometros de los tramos Sinryonpho-Unsan, Ryokpho-Ryuso, Jongbang-Sariwon, Taegyo-Sinanju, etc.
					
					Ya se han elaborado los planes de ampliacion.
					
					Este ano, seran modernizados mas de 70km pertenecientes a las Direcciones Ferroviarias de Pyongyang, Hamhung y Kaechon.

articles.title: Toma auge en Corea el cultivo de hongos
articles.content:
Toma auge en Corea el cultivo de hongos
Pyongyang, 23 de marzo (ACNC) -- Se eleva cada vez mas en Corea el entusiasmo por el cultivo de hongos.
					La Fabrica de Hongos de la ciudad de Pyongyang, entidad modelo del pais, y las otras construidas modernamente en distintas localidades normalizan en alto nivel la produccion de setas.
					
					La Fabrica de Zapatos de Wonsan,  la Granja Cooperativa de Chongsan del distrito de Kangso de la ciudad de Nampho y otros muchos organos, empresas, cooperativas y familias abundan la vida alimentaria con esa planta sin clorofila cultivada por cuenta propia.
					
					En Corea se cultivan hongos de diferentes variedades como agarico.
					
					Las bases de produccion seleccionan las especies de alta productividad convenientes a las respectivas localidades y perfeccionan el sistema productivo.
					
					Se esfuerzan por elevar el nivel de equipos tecnicos de todos los procesos como cultivo de cepas madre.
					
					Tienen lugar las labores para intercambiar y generalizar buenas experiencias.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun refuta proceder imprudente de Obama
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun refuta proceder imprudente de Obama
Pyongyang, 23 de marzo (ACNC) -- En su supuesta declaracion publicada en ocasion del 45o aniversario de vigencia del Tratado de No Proliferacion, Obama dijo que "todos los paises deben intensificar mas el dicho tratado con la meta comun de construir un nuevo mundo libre de armas nucleares".
					En un comentario individual insertado hoy, el diario Rodong Sinmun revela que sin tomar en consideracion la modernizacion de artefactos nucleares de su pais, Obama exige descaradamente a otros paises "establecer la meta comun por la construccion del mundo libre de armas nucleares", y prosigue:
					
					El imperio volvio a mencionar sobre la "intensificacion del TNP" para apretar a los paises desnuclearizados con el lazo del TNP y crear la era de hegemonia nuclear en que pueda ejercer a su antojo la amenaza nuclear.
					
					EE.UU. es pais criminal que empleo hace 70 anos las armas nucleares contra la humanidad.
					
					La poblacion mundial no olvida nunca los crimenes del imperio que al lanzar en 1945 las bombas nucleares sobre Hiroshima y Nagasaki de Japon, convirtio en un santiamen a esas ciudades en las ruinas llenas de polvos radioactivos. 
					
					No hay garantia de que EE.UU., que se entrega a modernizar las armas nucleares, no provoque la guerra nuclear que llevara a toda la humanidad un desastre nuclear.
					
					En vez de abogar por la "construccion de un mundo libre de armas nucleares", Obama debe renunciar por si mismo el "Premio Nobel de la  Paz" obtenido con las mentiras.
